trainings.title: FHWA-NHI-137049. ITS Procurement - WEB-BASED
trainings.description: This course provides an overview of strategies for deploying ITS projects, focusing on systems engineering principles and the procurement stage, from identifying needs to contractor selection.

trainings.title: FHWA-NHI-137050. ITS What, Why, and How
trainings.description: This course equips professionals responsible for ITS programs with an understanding of ITS capabilities, planning and procurement processes, operations management, and workforce needs for long-term success.

trainings.title: ITS ePrimer: Introduction to ITS
trainings.description: The ITS ePrimer is an online resource that provides foundational knowledge on integrating ITS technologies into transportation systems for professionals and students.

trainings.title: ARC-IT Training
trainings.description: This online ARC-IT training introduces ITS professionals to the architecture's background, structure, and use, providing a web-based alternative to on-site workshops and enabling effective navigation of the ARC-IT website for project definition.

trainings.title: RAD-IT Web-Based Training
trainings.description: This online RAD-IT training offers ITS professionals an alternative to on-site sessions, providing hands-on experience with the tool for developing and maintaining regional and project architectures.

trainings.title: SET-IT Web-Based Training
trainings.description: This online SET-IT training offers ITS professionals an alternative to on-site sessions, providing hands-on experience with the tool for developing ITS project architectures based on ARC-IT.

trainings.title: ITS Architecture Use & Maintenance Training
trainings.description: This web-based training offers ITS professionals an alternative to on-site workshops, guiding them in using and maintaining regional ITS architectures with instructor-led exercises.

trainings.title: # FHWA-NHI-137051. Systems Engineering Fundamentals for ITS
trainings.description: "Systems Engineering Fundamentals" is an 8-hour NHI course introducing ITS project staff to key systems engineering concepts and best practices like modeling, testing, and risk assessment.

trainings.title: Foundational Systems Engineering Activities to Support ITS Procurement
trainings.description: This course guides transportation professionals in applying systems engineering to support ITS project development, focusing on planning and needs-based scoping.

trainings.title: Foundational V2X Training
trainings.description: Participants are introduced to the key components that enable a V2X ecosystem, the potential benefits of the technology, and example use cases and the messages and standards supporting them while ensuring safety and privacy.

trainings.title: # FHWA-NHI-137060. Introduction to Connected Vehicles and Automated Vehicles
trainings.description: This course offers practitioners a foundational understanding of connected and automated vehicle technology, emphasizing USDOT's research and applications.

trainings.title: # FHWA-NHI-137072. Weather Responsive Traffic Management (WRTM)
trainings.description: WRTM is a 6-hour NHI web training for transportation managers on strategies to manage traffic flow during adverse weather, including implementation and performance evaluation tools.

trainings.title: # FHWA-NHI-137073. Principles and Tools for Road Weather Management
trainings.description: The course covers road weather problems, basic meteorology, and strategies like RWIS and decision support systems for traffic and emergency management.

trainings.title: # FHWA-NHI-137074. Road Weather Information Systems (RWIS) Equipment and Operations
trainings.description: RWIS Equipment and Operations is a 4-hour NHI web training on managing adverse weather challenges in road maintenance, focusing on RWIS initiatives and deployment action plans.

trainings.title: # FHWA-NHI-133126A. National Traffic Incident Management Responder Training
trainings.description: This web-based training [WBT] consists of five content lessons and a final assessment. Each lesson consists of multiple topics that focus on a particular concept.

trainings.title: # FHWA-NHI-133131. Planning for TSMO - Introduction
trainings.description: This 2-hour web-based course focuses on integrating TSMO into planning, covering performance-driven approaches, collaboration methods, and institutionalization strategies.

trainings.title: # FHWA-NHI-133132. Planning for TSMO - Concepts and Applications
trainings.description: This 6-hour web course builds on Course 1 (NHI-133131 Planning for TSMO) and covers integrating TSMO into transportation planning and implementing an objectives-driven performance-based approach.

trainings.title: Crowdsourcing for Operations Course as a Webinar Series
trainings.description: The "Crowdsourcing for Advancing Operations" webinar series provides insights from practitioners on using crowdsourced data to improve transportation operations.

trainings.title: # FHWA-NHI-137055. Transportation Cyber Security
trainings.description: The "Transportation Cyber Security" course is a 4-hour training that equips transportation professionals with key knowledge on cyber threats and vulnerabilities.
